argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clm0.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` F ) = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_clmsubrg | |- ( W e. CMod -> ( Base ` F ) e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` F ) ) = ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` F ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_cnfld1 | |- 1 = ( 1r ` CCfld ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_subrg1 | |- ( ( Base ` F ) e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) -> 1 = ( 1r ` ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` F ) ) ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. CMod -> 1 = ( 1r ` ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` F ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2 | #P_clmsca | |- ( W e. CMod -> F = ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` F ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( W e. CMod -> ( 1r ` F ) = ( 1r ` ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` F ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( W e. CMod -> 1 = ( 1r ` F ) ) |
